title: Build github project using VS continous integration
body:
Hello

I am trying to build a github project (php) using vs build tool online. I have authorized github using PAT. But i get this error when i queue a build:



2018-07-28T17:02:29.9921340Z ##[command]git -c http.extraheader="AUTHORIZATION: basic ***" fetch --tags --prune --progress --no-recurse-submodules origin
2018-07-28T17:02:31.8163655Z fatal: could not read Username for 'https://github.com': terminal prompts disabled
2018-07-28T17:02:32.2179619Z ##[error]Git fetch failed with exit code: 128
Any help will be much appreciated



Thanks

Renjith

nodes.body:
This sounds like an error with VSTS, rather than MSBuild itself (that error would occur in a build definition before invoking MSBuild).

Can you please look for help at https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/team-services/support/? In addition, this documentation might be useful: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/pipelines/build/ci-build-github.
